form.label: Configure
form.description: This dashboard is used to initially configure all the Linux Auditd app's lookups. Please use the time picker to determine how far back the app should learn then click 'Submit'.

search.query: | tstats values(host) as host WHERE [|inputlookup auditd_indicies] [|inputlookup auditd_sourcetypes] | mvexpand host limit=0 | outputlookup auditd_hosts

[|inputlookup auditd_indicies] [|inputlookup auditd_sourcetypes] type="DAEMON_START" | dedup host | rex field=kernel "^(?<kernel_version>[0-9\-\.]+)\.(?<distribution_release>[^\.]+)\.?(?<architecture>.*)" | eval architecture=if(architecture=="","unknown",architecture) | table host kernel_version distribution_release architecture | rename host as _key | outputlookup append=true auditd_host_inventory

[|inputlookup auditd_indicies] [|inputlookup auditd_sourcetypes] type="USER_START" acct=* NOT acct=root NOT auid=0 terminal=/dev/tty* OR NOT addr=? | dedup auid | table auid acct | rename auid as _key | rename acct as user | outputlookup append=true learnt_posix_identities
| tstats values(sourcetype) as sourcetype where [|inputlookup auditd_sourcetypes] by index | table index | outputlookup auditd_indicies
